changeSet.author: jmiranda (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE transaction_type SET name = 'Adjustment|fr:Ajustement' WHERE id = '3' AND name like 'Adjustment - Credit%';

changeSet.author: jmiranda (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE transaction_type SET name = 'Expired|fr:Expiré' WHERE id = '4' AND name like 'Expired%';

changeSet.author: jmiranda (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE transaction_type SET name = 'Damaged|fr:Endommagé' WHERE id = '5' AND name like 'Damaged%';

changeSet.author: jmiranda (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE transaction_type SET name = 'Transfer In|fr:Transfert Entrée' WHERE id = '8' AND name like 'Transfer In%';

changeSet.author: jmiranda (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE transaction_type SET name = 'Transfer Out|fr:Transfert Sortie' WHERE id = '9' AND name like 'Transfer Out%';
